The claim of Pennsylvania rejecting 372: 000 mail-in ballots was found to be false.
The rejection of 372: 000 was actually referring to the rejection of applications for mail-in ballots, not the rejection of actual ballots.
The rejection of applications was primar: where people had requested mail-in ballots for the state's primary election and also checked a box to be sent ballots for the general election.
The misinformation about the rejection o: in ballots was spread by conservative websites, including The Geller Report and The Blaze, as well as by Charlie Kirk, the founder of Turning Point USA, on Twitter.
